name: Eternal Strike! Pinball
description:
via GIPHY

Feeling stuck and alone during Covid-19? Want to just get back into the arcade to play some pinball? Wait no further. Play this new Sci-FI themed game on your PC today!

This fun exciting Pinball emulator lets you play as much as you like (with out spending money !!) Get yourself on the high score board and be recognized world wide!

3 Modes - Normal (3 Balls), Survival (1 Ball) and Edit Board (A mode under construction).

Eternal Strike! is Sci-Fi themed, set flying throughout space, 3D top-down style Pinball game made for windows.

Eternal Strike! was created by myself over 6 months, near every asset was created by myself.

Created by Chloe Mooney, 24.
